DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Predefined generic type for a chimney that is specified in an enumeration. There may be a property set given specificly for the predefined types.
NOTE  The PredefinedType shall only be used, if no IfcChimneyType is assigned, providing its own IfcChimneyType.PredefinedType.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the PredefinedType attribute is unset (e.g. because an IfcChimneyType is associated), or the inherited attribute ObjectType shall be provided, if the PredefinedType is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcChimneyTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcChimneyTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS (SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either there is no chimney type object associated, i.e. the IsTypedBy inverse relationship is not provided, or the associated type object has to be of type IfcChimneyType.
